project.name: C-C674A-GIMP-08-ST03-DT01-DF17-CF22-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C674A-GIMP-08-ST03-DT01-DF17-CF22-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Read a string from the input. Get the first character of the string, and then search the string for another instance of that first character.If the character does not appear, go into uncontrolled recursion.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="asdfasdf" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C674A-GIMP-08-ST03-DT01-DF17-CF22-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: color invert an image Read a string from the input. Get the first character of the string, and then search the string for another instance of that first character.If the character does not appear, go into uncontrolled recursion.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C674A-GIMP-08-ST03-DT01-DF17-CF22-01-GOOD-03
iopair.description: create a layer, fill with black, use divde layer mode Read a string from the input. Get the first character of the string, and then search the string for another instance of that first character.If the character does not appear, go into uncontrolled recursion.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

compare_check.name: GOOD-03
compare_check.expected: Layer created, and layer mode changed.
